DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : FORTUNE PETROLEUM BUYS INTEREST IN TEXAS GAS FIELD
DOC.TEXT: Agoura Hills-based Fortune Petroleum Corp . has finalized the acquisition of a 50 % interest in a 3 # 689-acre lease in the La Rosa Natural_Gas Field in Refugio County , Tex . The lease was purchased for $ 750 # 000 from Brooklyn Union . Fortune Petroleum is an independent oil and gas exploration and production company with principal properties in Texas and California .
